subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tim Lewis, who is a frequent N.F.L. head-coaching candidate, built powerful defenses with the Pittsburgh Steelers and was the first assistant coach to join Giants Coach Tom Coughlin in 2004.
snippet: Tim Lewis, who is a frequent N.F.L. head-coaching candidate, built powerful defenses with the Pittsburgh Steelers and was the first assistant coach to join Giants Coach Tom Coughlin in 2004.
